definitions.definition: Any substance purported to increase or enhance cognitive abilities.

A drug that enhances learning and memory and lacks the usual pharmacology of other psychotropic drugs (e.g. sedation , motor stimulation) and possesses very few side effects and extremely low toxicity .

main_definition: ( medicine ) Any substance purported to increase or enhance cognitive abilities.
secondary_definitions: ( pharmacology ) A drug that enhances learning and memory and lacks the usual pharmacology of other psychotropic drugs (e.g. sedation , motor stimulation) and possesses very few side effects and extremely low toxicity .
